description: Discover and list all InfiniBand Channel Adapters (CAs/HCAs) in the subnet. Queries the Subnet Manager to enumerate all host nodes connected to the InfiniBand fabric.

installation.notes: Part of infiniband-diags package. Install via: apt install infiniband-diags or yum install infiniband-diags

global_options.description: Use specified CA name for queries
Use specified CA port for queries
Timeout for SA queries in milliseconds

exit_codes.meaning: Error occurred (SA query failed, no fabric found)

common_usage_patterns.description: List all HCAs in the InfiniBand subnet
common_usage_patterns.output_example:
Ca      : 0x0002c903001f8c30 ports 2 "dgx-node-01 HCA-1"
Ca      : 0x0002c903001f8c32 ports 2 "dgx-node-02 HCA-1"
Ca      : 0x0002c903001f8c34 ports 2 "dgx-node-03 HCA-1"
Ca      : 0x0002c903001f8c36 ports 2 "dgx-node-04 HCA-1"

common_usage_patterns.description: Count total number of hosts in fabric

error_messages.meaning: InfiniBand driver not loaded or no IB devices present
error_messages.resolution: Load IB kernel modules with 'modprobe ib_core' or check device presence
Verify SM is running (opensm) and port is active (ibstat)

interoperability.notes: Queries the Subnet Administrator (SA) database. Requires active Subnet Manager in the fabric.

permissions.read_operations: No special permissions required for basic queries

limitations: Requires Subnet Manager to be running
Only shows hosts visible to the SA
Does not show disconnected or down nodes
Output depends on SM having completed discovery

reads_from.description: Reads HCA information from Subnet Administrator

triggered_by.effect: Host appears in ibhosts output after SM discovery

consistent_with.shared_state: HCA GUIDs and node descriptions must match
GUIDs are unique across hosts and switches
